sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku akan singgah di toko buku.
english translation: I will stop by the bookstore.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kopi ini enak, rasanya sip.
english translation: This coffee tastes good, it's sip.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memiliki profesi sebagai seorang insinyur sipil.
english translation: He has a profession as a civil engineer.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tetangga saya memiliki mata sipit.
english translation: My neighbor has narrow-eyes.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku membutuhkan sisir untuk merapikan rambutku.
english translation: I need a comb to tidy up my hair.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Perusahaan ini memiliki sistem manajemen yang baik.
english translation: This company has a good management system.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Banyak siswa yang aktif dalam kegiatan ekstrakurikuler.
english translation: Many students are active in extracurricular activities.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sedang menulis skripsi tentang perubahan iklim.
english translation: He is writing a thesis about climate change.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong bantu saya dengan soal matematika ini.
english translation: Please help me with this math question.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku ingin ikut, tapi soalnya aku sedang sakit.
english translation: I want to join, but the problem is I'm sick.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pastikan untuk mengikuti SOP yang ada.
english translation: Make sure to follow the existing standard operating procedure.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sopir taksi ini sangat ramah.
english translation: This taxi driver is very friendly.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka jalan-jalan sore hari.
english translation: I like taking a walk in the afternoon.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan lupa membawa STNK dan SIM saat berkendara.
english translation: Don't forget to bring the vehicle registration certificate and driving license when driving.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sedang menempuh studi di perguruan tinggi terkenal.
english translation: He is studying at a famous university.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jurusan studi pembangunan menarik bagi saya.
english translation: Development study major is interesting for me.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Suara burung itu sangat merdu.
english translation: The voice of the bird is very melodious.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku ingin memberikanmu suatu kejutan.
english translation: I want to give you a surprise.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku sudah membaca buku itu selesai.
english translation: I have already finished reading that book.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mereka sudah berpacaran sudah berapa lama?
english translation: How long have they been in a relationship?
